Best seafood restaurant in NY! Great customer service and super clean. Fish tacos 10/10. Def one of fav spots to eat.

I ordered the Catfish meal, Shrimp and fried crab sticks. Everything was seasoned perfectly and the size is amazing. They have smoothies too and the Sunset Breeze sample I was given is perfect. My new go to Seafood Market. Locally and cost efficient. If I could give a 10/10 I would.

Blue Bay Kitchen & Market is a real gem, here. The environment of the place is clean, people working there are friendly and eager to help, the location is beautiful. Also, the food is great, they serve fresh food with good taste. If you are‚Ä¶

This place and food is amazing!  I picked up orders for many of our staff at Mercy Center and everyone raved about their meal.  The quality and quantity of the food will have us going back for sure.

We couldn't have asked for better service either.  Everyone's meal was packed with everything we needed.

I love that this place is finally opened. Friendly atmosphere, courteous service and family ran by locals is a plus. And of course the food is tasty and fresh.
My son had the crabcakes and drank a pina colada ( yes! They have smoothies too) while waiting for his order.
The drink was soooo good we bought another one.
They also have fresh coconuts to drink for my healthy foodies.

Thank you for keeping this neighborhood staple alive.
See you again soon.
